title: Implement core video upload and feed features

requirements.text: Create a video upload interface that allows users to select and upload video files with a progress bar showing upload status
acceptanceCriteria: User can select video files from their device
Upload completes successfully and provides feedback

requirements.text: Implement backend storage and retrieval system for uploaded videos
acceptanceCriteria: Videos are stored persistently in the backend
Videos can be retrieved by unique identifier
System handles video metadata (title, upload date, uploader)

requirements.text: Create a video feed displaying uploaded videos with thumbnail previews
acceptanceCriteria: Feed displays all uploaded videos in a grid or list layout
Each video shows a thumbnail preview
Videos are clickable to view full content

requirements.text: Implement video playback functionality with standard controls (play, pause, seek, volume)
acceptanceCriteria: Videos play when selected from the feed
Standard video controls are available and functional
Video player is responsive and handles different screen sizes

requirements.text: Apply Nexustube branding with red primary color (#FF0000), yellow-orange secondary color (#FFC00E), and dark gradient background with neon vibe
acceptanceCriteria: Primary red color is used for key UI elements and branding
Secondary yellow-orange color is used for accents and highlights
Dark gradient background with neon aesthetic is applied throughout the app
Color scheme creates a cohesive, modern visual identity

constraints: Do not integrate YouTube Data API
Use only Motoko for backend logic
Use React with TypeScript for frontend
Do not modify immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useInternetIdentity.tsx, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui)
